nodes.text: Ultimate Sticker Book: Star Wars: Brave Allies

Ultimate Sticker Book: Star Wars: Brave Allies is a Star Wars sticker book for young readers. It was collected in the Star Wars Ultimate Book Collection and published by Dorling Kindersley in September 2015. The book contains material previously published in Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars: Battles of the Clone Wars (2013) and Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars: The Phantom Menace (2012).
